ViewPoint.description: This calc is intented to deal with the organizational structure which is the first step of Flexo Methodology

EditionPattern.name: RootOrganizationUnit
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define concept of top level organization unit. This is the root level in the scope of the project.

Parameter.name: organizationUnitName
Parameter.label: organization_unit_name
Parameter.description: Allow to enter organization unit name while dropping concept

Parameter.name: organizationUnitURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: organizationUnitDescription
Parameter.label: organization_unit_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description of the organization unit

Parameter.name: organizationUnit
Parameter.label: concept_scheme
Parameter.description: Allow to choose existing root organization unit

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationUnit
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define an organization unit inside an other organization unit.

DropScheme.name: DropOrganizationUnitInOrganizationUnit
DropScheme.description: Create a new organization unit inside parent organization unit

Parameter.name: organizationUnitName
Parameter.label: organization_unit_name
Parameter.description: Allow to enter organization unit name while dropping concept

Parameter.name: organizationUnitURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: organizationUnitDescription
Parameter.label: organization_unit_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description of the organization unit

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationUnitMission
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define a mission for an organization unit

Parameter.name: missionName
Parameter.label: mission
Parameter.description: Allow to enter short name for mission

Parameter.name: missionURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: missionDescription
Parameter.label: mission_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the organization unit mission

ShapeGraphicalRepresentation.text: <Mission> Describe here the mission of organizational unit.

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationUnitObjective
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define an objective for an organization unit

Parameter.name: objectiveName
Parameter.label: objective
Parameter.description: Allow to enter short name for objective

Parameter.name: objectiveURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: objectiveDescription
Parameter.label: objective_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the organization unit objective

ShapeGraphicalRepresentation.text: <Objective> Describe here the objective of organization unit

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationUnitPosition
EditionPattern.description: Allows to add a position for an organization unit

Parameter.name: positionName
Parameter.label: position
Parameter.description: Allow to enter short name for position

Parameter.name: positionURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: positionDescription
Parameter.label: position_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the organization unit position

EditionPattern.name: PositionMission
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define a position mission

Parameter.name: missionName
Parameter.label: mission
Parameter.description: Allow to enter short name for mission

Parameter.name: missionURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: missionDescription
Parameter.label: mission_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the position mission

ShapeGraphicalRepresentation.text: <Mission> Describe here the mission of position

EditionPattern.name: PositionTask
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define a position task

Parameter.name: taskName
Parameter.label: task
Parameter.description: Allow to enter short name for task

Parameter.name: taskURI
Parameter.label: uri
Parameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

Parameter.name: taskDescription
Parameter.label: task_description
Parameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the position task

LocalizedDictionary.Localized: Choose and draw root organization unit
